DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will provide an opportunity to document local patterns of susceptibility, patient profile, and usefulness of screening in postmenopausal patients coming to gynecology outpatient clinics in Pakistan. This will also capture the initial management of PMO in diagnosed patients. The information gathered will serve as a foundation for developing national guidelines on screening and management of PMO in Pakistan.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Post Menopausal Osteoporosis (PMO) Among Gynecology Outpatients in Pakistan
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal women Age 50 years or greater Previously diagnosed osteoporosis, or receiving treatment for osteoporosis
